items.question: Can I book a provider for the same day?
items.answer:
For certain services, you can request same-day service.
A professional will send you an offer as soon as possible.

items.question: How to benefit from the referral offer?
items.answer: Go to your personal space to get your referral code and share it with your loved ones.

items.question: How to contact Come2me customer support?
items.answer: You can contact us via the app, by email, or through our support number available 7/7.

items.question: How can I report a problem with my order?
items.answer: Go to the 'My Orders' section, select the order concerned, and click 'Report a problem'.
